description.value:
Trigger A creature enters the area

Effect The triggering creature is exposed to the Fiendflame Cage's clashing energies. The triggering creature takes @Damage[8d6[spirit],4d6[spirit],4d6[spirit]]{8d6 spirit damage, 4d6 spirit damage, and 4d6 spirit damage} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:47|basic:true]). The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: The Fiendflame Cage is uncontrolled, releasing holy light and hellfire in the area.
details.disable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:48], @Check[type:nature|dc:48], @Check[type:occultism|dc:48], or @Check[type:religion|dc:48] (master) four times on the Fiendflame Cage to calm it through ritual incantations
details.routine: (2 actions) On its initiative, the Fiendflame Cage uses 1 action to release a wave of hellfire, dealing @Damage[(2d10+12)[evil],(2d10+12)[fire]]{2d10+12 evil damage and 2d10+12 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15]{15-foot-radius burst} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:47|basic:true]). The Fiendflame Cage uses its second action to release a wave of holy light, dealing @Damage[(2d10+12)[good],(2d10+12)[fire]]{2d10+12 good damage and 2d10+12 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15]{15-foot-radius burst} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:47|basic:true]).
